org.easybatch.jms

Class JmsPoisonRecordBroadcaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.jms.JmsPoisonRecordBroadcaster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobListener

    public class JmsPoisonRecordBroadcaster
extends java.lang.Object
implements JobListener
    A utility job listener that broadcasts a JmsPoisonRecord at the end of the job.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)
